tool.name: MCPL Tool
tool.command: #import re #set $name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($input.element_identifier)) + "." + str($input.ext) docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source=$input,target=/$name,readonly docker.io/mccode/mcstas-2.7.1-3.1:1.0 mcpltool $dump_options /$name > $output
tool.help:
A tool to extract a header from an mcpl file.
-----
**Dump options** By default include the info in the FILE header plus the first ten contained particles. Modify with the following options:
-j, --justhead : Dump just header info and no particle info. -n, --nohead : Dump just particle info and no header info. -lN : Dump up to N particles from the file (default 10). You can specify -l0 to disable this limit. -sN : Skip past the first N particles in the file (default 0). -bKEY : Dump binary blob stored under KEY to standard output.
